entities.name: loss
entities.description: Loss is described as something that had snuffed out Harry's sleep.

entities.name: fear
entities.description: Fear is described as something that had snuffed out Harry's sleep.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is described as being slapped awake by loss and fear.

entities.name: Voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone who had been present in Nurmengard and had killed someone in a cell.

entities.name: Nurmengard
entities.description: Nurmengard is described as the location where Voldemort was present and had committed a murder.

entities.name: Wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is mentioned as someone who had been killed by Voldemort due to an unconscious impulse of mercy.

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who had foreseen Wormtail's death and knew more about it.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being ill and taken care of by Fleur.

entities.name: Fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as taking care of Hermione.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being present with Harry and Dean in the grave.

relationships.description: Voldemort killed Wormtail due to an unconscious impulse of mercy.
